attributes.action: Guarantee that any surplus Covid-19 vaccine doses are sent to poorer countries
attributes.additional_details: As one of the richest countries in the world it is our duty to make sure that poorer nations are able to protect their populations from covid 19. The UK has stockpiled far more doses than the population require for various vaccines and as such should give any surplus to poorer nations
attributes.background: Any purchased vaccine doses that remain after the UK population has been vaccinated are sent to poorer countries around the world. Ensuring their populations are protected as well

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Increase funding to make Covid-19 vaccines available to developing countries
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550900
